de.uni_potsdam.hpi.bpt.bp2014.database

Class DbTerminationCondition

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.uni_potsdam.hpi.bpt.bp2014.database.DbObject
      • de.uni_potsdam.hpi.bpt.bp2014.database.DbTerminationCondition

  • public class DbTerminationCondition
extends DbObject
    This class creates and executes sql statements to get the terminationCondition for a scenario.

      • getConditionsForScenario

        public java.util.LinkedList<Condition> getConditionsForScenario(int scenario_id)
        Creates a list of Conditions which shall terminate the scenario if they are fulfilled.
        Parameters:
        scenario_id - This is the database ID of a scenario.
        Returns:
        a list of conditions which terminate the scenario if fulfilled.

      • getConditionsSetIDsForScenario

        Returns:

      • getConditionsForConditionSetAndScenario

        public java.util.LinkedList<Condition> getConditionsForConditionSetAndScenario(int scenario_id,
                                                                      int conditionSet_id)
        Creates a list of conditions from an ID of a scenario and the corresponding conditionSet.
        Parameters:
        scenario_id - This is the database ID of a scenario.
        conditionSet_id - This is the database ID of a conditionSet which belongs to the scenario.
        Returns:
        a list of conditions for a scenario and the corresponding conditionSet.

      • getDetailedConditionsForScenario

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,java.util.List<java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object>>> getDetailedConditionsForScenario(int scenarioID)
        Returns a list of Hashmap with all the information of a Termination Condition of one specific Scenario. Tje Scenario is specified by the given id.
        Parameters:
        scenarioID - the id of the given Scenario
